title: Allow for multiple connection files to be opened at the same time
author: enkelmedia
body_snippet:
First of all, thanks for a great utility! Saves me a lot of time!

## Expected Behavior
I would like to share connections with some of my co-workers and it seems like we can just put our connection-xml on some shared drive, dropbox or something like this to share the connections.

However, I would also like to have some private connections that I don't want my co-workers to access. 

I'm aware that it would be possible to have two different connection files and open the one I want to work...

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: Hello, thanks for warm words :) this will be posible with connection profiles implementation. That allow you to have user profile - and join as many connections profiles into as you wish, in advance it will allow you to have multiple profiles per user so you could switch on the fly if needed.

comments.author: enkelmedia
comments.snippet:
Hi @Kvarkas ! 

Thanks for your kind answer! 

That sounds great! =D

Are you saying that "connection profiles" is something that already exists or is this some feature already in the backlog/in development?

// m

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: In curent version they are not, but I am doing some preparation in code so could implement some that I have on scratch pad.

comments.author: mrPsycho
comments.snippet: using db backend allows it: you create users in db, then setup setting file to use database engine with needed user and you should be able to run several applications with different access rules to records.  (for example https://mariadb.com/resources/blog/protect-your-data-row-level-security-in-mariadb-10-0/)
